abstract: Talks continue into a second day between Boston Globe and Newspaper Guild.
snippet: Talks continue into a second day between Boston Globe and Newspaper Guild.
lead_paragraph: The Boston Globe and the Boston Newspaper Guild negotiated (it’s safe to use that word now, isn’t it?) past midnight Tuesday and are set to resume talking at 3 p.m. With the talks proceeding, the guild postponed a meeting, scheduled for Tuesday, with the National Labor Relations Board on its complaint of unfair labor practices against the company.

headline.main: Talks Continue Between Boston Globe and Newspaper Guild
